scripts.build: npm run build:tokens && npm run build:theme && npm run build:theme-gatsbyjs-org
scripts.watch: microbundle watch src/index.js src/theme.js src/theme-gatsbyjs-org.js --sourcemap=false -f es,cjs
scripts.build:tokens: (microbundle build --sourcemap=false -f es,cjs) || node -e "console.log('\nMicrobundle failed, make sure you\'re using node version 10.16 or higher\n');process.exit(1)"
scripts.build:theme: (microbundle build src/theme.js -o dist/theme.js --sourcemap=false -f es,cjs) || node -e "console.log('\nMicrobundle failed, make sure you\'re using node version 10.16 or higher\n');process.exit(1)"
scripts.build:theme-gatsbyjs-org: (microbundle build src/theme-gatsbyjs-org.js -o dist/theme-gatsbyjs-org.js --sourcemap=false -f es,cjs) || node -e "console.log('\nMicrobundle failed, make sure you\'re using node version 10.16 or higher\n');process.exit(1)"
